HomePage.title: Universal Unit Converter
HomePage.description: Professional unit converter for converting all types of units: length, mass, time, temperature, speed, energy, pressure, volume, area, and digital data
HomePage.heroSubtitle: Convert any unit quickly and accurately with a simple and easy-to-use interface

title.length: Length Converter - Convert Meter, Foot, Mile, Centimeter, Inch
title.mass: Mass Converter - Convert Kilogram, Pound, Gram, Ounce
title.time: Time Converter - Convert Hour, Minute, Second, Day, Week
title.temperature: Temperature Converter - Convert Celsius, Fahrenheit, Kelvin
title.speed: Speed Converter - Convert km/h, mph, knot
title.energy: Energy Converter - Convert Joule, kWh, Calorie
title.pressure: Pressure Converter - Convert Pascal, Bar, PSI
title.volume: Volume Converter - Convert Liter, Gallon, Cubic Meter
title.area: Area Converter - Convert m², ft², Acre, Hectare
title.digitalData: Digital Data Converter - Convert Byte, KB, MB, GB, TB

description.length: Comprehensive length converter to convert between meter, foot, mile, centimeter, inch, yard, kilometer, and nautical mile. Instant and accurate conversion.
description.mass: Mass converter to convert between kilogram, pound, gram, ounce, ton, and stone. Easy and free conversion tool.
description.time: Time converter to convert between second, minute, hour, day, week, month, and year. Fast and accurate time unit conversion.
description.temperature: Temperature converter to convert between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin. Easy temperature conversion tool.
description.speed: Speed converter to convert between m/s, km/h, mph, and knot. Instant conversion for all speed units.
description.energy: Energy converter to convert between Joule, Kilojoule, Calorie, Kilowatt Hour, and British Thermal Unit.
description.pressure: Pressure converter to convert between Pascal, Kilopascal, Bar, PSI, Atmosphere, and Torr.
description.volume: Volume converter to convert between Liter, Milliliter, Cubic Meter, Gallon, Cup, Pint, and Quart.
description.area: Area converter to convert between m², ft², mi², Acre, Hectare, and cm².
description.digitalData: Digital data converter to convert between Byte, Kilobyte, Megabyte, Gigabyte, Terabyte, and Bit.
